items.name: Testing Strategy & Assessment
items.description: Tailored strategies to define the testing approach and ensure optimal SAP system performance.

items.name: Functional & Regression Testing
items.description: Ensuring core functions are working correctly and maintaining stability through updates.

items.description: Verifying the accuracy and integrity of migrated data during system transitions.

items.description: Validating critical business processes for smooth and efficient operations.

items.imagePath: /Services/SAP Auditing & Testing Services/Our SAP testing services encompass the following types of offerings/Integration Testing.png
items.name: Integration Testing
items.description: Ensuring seamless collaboration between SAP modules and third-party systems.

items.imagePath: /Services/SAP Auditing & Testing Services/Our SAP testing services encompass the following types of offerings/User Acceptance Testing (UAT).png
items.name: User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
items.description: Confirming system readiness by validating it meets end-user requirements and expectations.

items.name: Test Automation
items.description: Enhancing efficiency through automated testing processes using advanced tools.

items.imagePath: /Services/SAP Auditing & Testing Services/Our SAP testing services encompass the following types of offerings/Performance, Load & Stress Testing.png
items.name: Performance, Load & Stress Testing
items.description: Evaluating system robustness by testing under varying loads and stress conditions.
